name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Theana Productions)
description:
A little game made to relax where you only need your mouse... and a little luck.

Two game modes are available:

  • Easy : click on as many blocks as you wish until you find your plushie
  • Hard: you start with 10 tries but you can win some more by finding some hearts

Press H to go back to the main menu and choose another theme.

Game initially made for the Mini Jam 87.
